content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":207262,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ランスの体は自然と動いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Rance's body moved instinctively."},{"lineNumber":207263,"originalJapaneseLine":"そっと、震える手を氷像に添える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gently, he placed his trembling hand upon the ice statue."},{"lineNumber":207264,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の魔力が波紋となって広がる――","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon Lord's magic power spread out in ripples—"},{"lineNumber":207265,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは魔王の氷の中に浸透していき、","translatedEnglishLine":"It penetrated the Demon Lord's ice,"},{"lineNumber":207266,"originalJapaneseLine":"永遠の絶対零度を溶かしてゆく。","translatedEnglishLine":"melting the eternal absolute zero."},{"lineNumber":207267,"originalJapaneseLine":"口が勝手に動き――いつか共にいた女性の名を呼ぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"His mouth moved of its own accord — calling the name of the woman who was once with him."},{"lineNumber":207268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………シィル」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Shirle.\""},{"lineNumber":207269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィル、シィル、シィル……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shirle, Shirle, Shirle...\""},{"lineNumber":207270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「帰ってこい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come back...\""},{"lineNumber":207271,"originalJapaneseLine":"「帰ってこい！　シィル！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come back! Shirle!\""},{"lineNumber":207272,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then—"},{"lineNumber":207273,"originalJapaneseLine":"15年以上の長い時を経て、ついに氷が砕かれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"After more than fifteen long years, the ice finally shattered."},{"lineNumber":207274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィ、ル……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shi...rle...\""},{"lineNumber":207275,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":207276,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":207277,"originalJapaneseLine":"長い時、眠り続けた少女が瞼を開く。","translatedEnglishLine":"The girl who had slept for a long time opened her eyelids."},{"lineNumber":207278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……あれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... what...\""},{"lineNumber":207279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラン、ス……様？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ran...ce...sama?\""},{"lineNumber":207280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":207281,"originalJapaneseLine":"少女が気づいた時には、","translatedEnglishLine":"By the time the girl realized,"},{"lineNumber":207282,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分の主であり、最愛の男性に抱きしめられていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"she was being embraced by her master and most beloved man."},{"lineNumber":207283,"originalJapaneseLine":"その力はとても強く、ともすれば","translatedEnglishLine":"His embrace was so strong that, if careless,"},{"lineNumber":207284,"originalJapaneseLine":"少女の華奢な体は壊れてしまいそうなほど。","translatedEnglishLine":"the girl's fragile body might have been broken."},{"lineNumber":207285,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、絶対に壊れないように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Yet, as if to ensure she wouldn't break,"},{"lineNumber":207286,"originalJapaneseLine":"慎重に我慢しているような……","translatedEnglishLine":"he held back carefully..."},{"lineNumber":207287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……ランス、様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... Rance-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":207288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":207289,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは無意識の行動だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was an unconscious action."},{"lineNumber":207290,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは自然とランスを抱きしめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shirle naturally hugged Rance."},{"lineNumber":207291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":207292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no...\""},{"lineNumber":207293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":207294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「泣きそうな顔をしていらっしゃるので……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"because you looked like you were about to cry...\""},{"lineNumber":207295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":207296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":207297,"originalJapaneseLine":"言葉など聞こえていないかのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if not hearing her words,"},{"lineNumber":207298,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはより強く、シィルを抱きしめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance hugged Shirle even tighter."},{"lineNumber":207299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、様……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance-sama...?\""},{"lineNumber":207300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Always...\""},{"lineNumber":207301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっと傍にいろと言っただろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I told you to always stay by my side.\""},{"lineNumber":207302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私……お傍にいても、いいんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it... really alright for me to stay by your side?\""},{"lineNumber":207303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当たり前だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course...\""},{"lineNumber":207304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺は、お前が好きなんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I love you...\""},{"lineNumber":207305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":207306,"originalJapaneseLine":"「初めて会ったときから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From the moment I first met you..."},{"lineNumber":207307,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっと、ずっと好きだったんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've loved you continuously, all along.\""},{"lineNumber":207308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから離れるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So don't leave me."},{"lineNumber":207309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっとだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Always."},{"lineNumber":207310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは、命令だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is an order.\""},{"lineNumber":207311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":207312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私、とても……とても、嬉しいです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am very... very happy...\""},{"lineNumber":207313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっと、ずっと、思ってた夢……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The dream I've always and always wished for..."},{"lineNumber":207314,"originalJapaneseLine":"　叶っちゃいました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"has come true...\""},{"lineNumber":207315,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうかよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so...?\""},{"lineNumber":207316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes..."},{"lineNumber":207317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私……ランス様のこと……ずっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I... I've always loved Rance-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":207318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっと、好きです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've always loved you...\""},{"lineNumber":207319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":207320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知ってるわ、馬鹿者」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I know that, you fool.\""},{"lineNumber":207321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're such..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスの体は自然と動いていた。
そっと、震える手を氷像に添える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gently, he placed his trembling hand upon the ice statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の魔力が波紋となって広がる――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Lord's magic power spread out in ripples—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは魔王の氷の中に浸透していき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It penetrated the Demon Lord's ice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永遠の絶対零度を溶かしてゆく。
口が勝手に動き――いつか共にいた女性の名を呼ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His mouth moved of its own accord — calling the name of the woman who was once with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 15年以上の長い時を経て、ついに氷が砕かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After more than fifteen long years, the ice finally shattered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い時、眠り続けた少女が瞼を開く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl who had slept for a long time opened her eyelids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女が気づいた時には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time the girl realized,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の主であり、最愛の男性に抱きしめられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was being embraced by her master and most beloved man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力はとても強く、ともすれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His embrace was so strong that, if careless,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女の華奢な体は壊れてしまいそうなほど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the girl's fragile body might have been broken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、絶対に壊れないように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yet, as if to ensure she wouldn't break,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慎重に我慢しているような……
それは無意識の行動だった。
シィルは自然とランスを抱きしめていた。
「泣きそうな顔をしていらっしゃるので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "because you looked like you were about to cry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言葉など聞こえていないかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if not hearing her words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはより強く、シィルを抱きしめる。
「ずっと傍にいろと言っただろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you to always stay by my side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私……お傍にいても、いいんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it... really alright for me to stay by your side?"
"From the moment I first met you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと、ずっと好きだったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've loved you continuously, all along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私、とても……とても、嬉しいです……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The dream I've always and always wished for...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私……ランス様のこと……ずっと……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスの体は自然と動いていた。
そっと、震える手を氷像に添える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gently, he placed his trembling hand upon the ice statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の魔力が波紋となって広がる――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Lord's magic power spread out in ripples—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは魔王の氷の中に浸透していき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It penetrated the Demon Lord's ice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永遠の絶対零度を溶かしてゆく。
口が勝手に動き――いつか共にいた女性の名を呼ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His mouth moved of its own accord — calling the name of the woman who was once with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 15年以上の長い時を経て、ついに氷が砕かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After more than fifteen long years, the ice finally shattered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い時、眠り続けた少女が瞼を開く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl who had slept for a long time opened her eyelids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女が気づいた時には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time the girl realized,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の主であり、最愛の男性に抱きしめられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was being embraced by her master and most beloved man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力はとても強く、ともすれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His embrace was so strong that, if careless,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女の華奢な体は壊れてしまいそうなほど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the girl's fragile body might have been broken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、絶対に壊れないように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yet, as if to ensure she wouldn't break,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慎重に我慢しているような……
それは無意識の行動だった。
シィルは自然とランスを抱きしめていた。
「泣きそうな顔をしていらっしゃるので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "because you looked like you were about to cry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言葉など聞こえていないかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if not hearing her words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはより強く、シィルを抱きしめる。
「ずっと傍にいろと言っただろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you to always stay by my side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私……お傍にいても、いいんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it... really alright for me to stay by your side?"
"From the moment I first met you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと、ずっと好きだったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've loved you continuously, all along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私、とても……とても、嬉しいです……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The dream I've always and always wished for...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私……ランス様のこと……ずっと……」
